title: Hextech crafting chests daily limitation
body: Is there a  limitation for how many chests you can buy per day and how many?

replies.body: Yes, there is a limit to how many you can purchase in a day!  Per our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you can purchase up to 25 chests per day.  Happy looting!
